colleges.name: East China Normal University(ECNU)
colleges.major: Electronic Science and Technology in Physics department

projects.title: Full Stack Scrum Development For SaaS Application
description: As Scrum Master, in the first iteration, created user stories with Pivotal Tracker after interacting with customers and designed lo-fi UI mockups and storyboards

In the following iteration, based on MVC model, constructed the web application with Ruby on Rails, designed application view with CSS/Bootstrap and improved customers interactive experience with JavaScript/jQuery
Created a comprehensive set of Cucumber and RSpec test cases for each user story, kept each version using Git, and then deployed to Heroku
Received feedbacks from customers each iteration and adjusted plans for the following iterations

projects.title: Network Routing Optimization
description: Constructed graph models for real-world complex networks with Java

Applied multiple data structures like linked list and heap and different max-bandwidth-path algorithms like Dijkstra and Kruskal algorithm to implement different network routing protocols on each network model with Java

projects.title: Socket Programming and NS-2 Simulation
description: Implemented the client which uses I/O multiplexing to handle both sending and receiving messages and the server for a chat service with C
Implemented a Trivial File Transfer Protocol(TFTP) server over UDP
Designed a simple HTTP proxy server and HTTP command line client
Constructed a simulated network and tested it with DROPTAIL and RED buffer management strategies separately with NS-2 simulator

projects.title: Genetic-Based Machine Learning Approaches
description: Designed algorithms according to three classification rules: DLDA, 3NN and SVM, two error estimator: Resubstitution and Leave-one-out cross-validation, and two feature procedure: Exhaustive Search and Sequential Forward Search
Designed a parallel computing approach to improve the calculating efficiency
Selected optimal gene expression data set as classification criterion from a large number of cancer data with the above algorithms separately in Matlab

projects.title: Database and Interactive User Interface Design
description: According to customers' requirements, organized the required information and designed detailed data models of a new database based on MYSQL
Built a moderately user-friendly interactive application program connected to the database server based on Java
